message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. I think it would be a great asset to you.  Given its value, I'm offering it to you for $14,000. What do you think?
I'm really interested in the product, but $14,000 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. Can we meet in the middle at $10,500?
Bob, I appreciate your interest and counteroffer.  While I'm motivated to sell,  $10,500 is cutting it a bit close to my bottom line.  Could you do $12,000? That feels like a fair compromise.
I understand you're motivated to sell, but $12,000 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway from my previous offer, so I'm thinking $10,000. Can we make a deal at that price?
